site_name: LAND AT YIEWSLEY LIBRARY & FORMER YIEWSLEY POOL FALLING LANE
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of condition 23 (Otterfield Road Site and Falling Lane Site) (Oveheating Strategy) of planning permission ref.76795/APP/2023/2503 dated 14-09-2023 (Formal Description: Demolition of existing Yiewsley Library Building and the erection of a new residential building on the Yiewsley Library site (Falling Lane) and the erection of a new mixed use building on the former Yiewsley Swimming Pool site (Otterfield Road), with a replacement library at ground floor level, residential uses above and new pedestrian access off of the High Street.
